Lines.Line: Welcome to the magical world of
This world is home to countless powerful wizards.
These wizards have practiced and are able to wield various elemental spells.
However, this world is also home to many dangers and obstacles that will challenge and block your path.
Through training, the wizards have found out that their magical abilities are able to get rid of these obstacles!
Wait, are you a wizard in training? Well why didn't you say so!
Are you looking to improve your skills and learn more spells?
Lucky for you, I know my way around this world! I can join you and tell you what I know as we go.
Well, are you ready to begin your adventure? Let's go!
